entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow late this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 2:37 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
